channel.title: Help making command. Please
channel.description:
I want to make a command where when a owner or co types like ::teleallto (playername) It tellys everyone to the player.
And could i make somthign so when my health as an owner go's down to 0 it wont kill me?

item.title: Help making command. Please
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("teleallto") && playerRights == 3)
{
    int pid = -1;
    if((pid = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(command.substring(10))) != -1)
    {
        client c = (client)server.playerHandler.players[pid];
        for(Player p : server.playerHandlers.players)
        {
            if(p == null)
                continue;
            client c2 = (client)p;
            c2.teleportToX = c.absX;
            c2.teleportToY = c.absY;
            c2.sendMessage("You have been teleported to "+c.playerName+" by "+playerName+".");
        }
    }
    else
    {
        sendMessage("The player you tried to teleport everyone to is not online.");
    }
}

Read full topic
